channel.title: Comments on: Show Latest Blog Posts on any PHP page

item.title: By: Brent

item.description: update... We don't use MagPie anymore, we've been using simpleXML which is part of PHP5, learn more here: <a href="http://www.phpro.org/tutorials/Introduction-To-SimpleXML-With-PHP.html" rel="nofollow">http://www.phpro.org/tutorials/Introduction-To-Si...</a>
